description:
Look out Yuko, Shion`s up to something... and she won`t rest until she runs her experiments! Then, can Yuko and Momo keep a secret from Ryoko?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Gosenzo wa Shinka Suru!! Megane ga Utsusu Ankoku Heya
The Ancestor Evolves!! A Pair of Glasses Reflect Within a Dark Lab
ご先祖は進化する!! メガネが映す暗黒部屋
선조님은 진화한다!! 안경이 비추는 암흑의 방
